title: The Celtics' Turnaround and an All-Star Draft
description:
Zach and Brian Scalabrine discuss the red-hot Celtics and their chances in the East, then Zach and ESPN's Kevin Pelton draft their own All-Star teams and talk MVP, the top of each conference, more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
